name: Box Maze
description: Jump into the life of Cubert, and help him reach his true love as you find your way through unique levels without being destroyed by your enemies as well as other obstacles, encounter new enemies and bosses as you climb the levels, collect cupcakes for your love along the way as you find hidden secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 1.8Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9500 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card Additional Notes: Box Maze hardly uses any computing power and is very likely to run smooth on most computers. If your pc has lower specs than this and runs the game without issues please let us know so we can look into it and update this information.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above. Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9800 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
